content.rendered:
Zortrax Inventure FDM 3D Printer

The Zortrax Inventure is a smart affordable 3D printer that you can rely on to produce professional quality prints.

  • Works in the LPD Plus dual-extrusion technology
  • Supports single and dual extrusion modes
  • Has a 135 x 135 x 130 mm workspace
  • Works with third-party filaments
  • 3D prints high-temperature ABS-based filaments with water-soluble support
  • Has an enclosed, heated printing chamber
  • Has a built-in HEPA filter

Buy Now contact us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent St,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.

Send a Message

    Are you uploading files larger than 5mb?
    Upload Large File

    Do you want a quote based on your STL?
    Instant Quote Calculator


    (Accepted filetypes: pdf,jpg,jpeg,png & gif. Max file size: 5mb)

    Dual Head Printing

    The Zortrax Inventure features a dual nozzle system which allows you to print both a model and soluble support material. The Inventure changes materials automatically, switching between Z-SUPPORT and any one of the available materials, either Z-PLA or Z-PETG.

    Soluble Support Material

    The Zortrax Inventure is equipped with a quick and easy-to-use Dissolvable Support System. The DSS consists of a fluid-flow station and DSS Activator that dissolves the support. Leave your print soaking in the water-based fluid for a few hours to completely wash away the supports. A quick and easy process that’s completely hands-free.

    Detailed Functional Parts

    Printing intricate objects and moving mechanisms with a tight tolerance has never been easier, even if the moving parts is internal to the model.

    material diameter
    1.75 mm

    built-in
    encoders

    automatic change
    of materials

    Advanced Technology

    When designing the Inventure 3D printer, Zortrax created a new technology – called Layer Plastic Deposition Plus. LPD Plus, combined with the new Dissolvable Support System delivers a robust and innovative solution for Fused Filament printing with soluble support structures.

    workspace dimensions
    140 x 140 x 140 mm

    resolution
    90-200 microns

    wall thickness
    optimal: 800 microns

    resolution of single printable point
    400 microns

    The Complete Solution

    The Zortrax Inventure is delivered complete as a complete system with Z-SUITE and a full starter kit. The set also includes Z-SUITE, a full starter kit, a cartridge of Z-ULTRAT Plus, a cartridge of Z-SUPPORT, and an optional DSS (Dissolvable Support System) Station.

    Zortrax 3D Printing Materials

    Explore the benefits and applications of each material.

    Read More

    Zortrax Inventure Specifications

    Physical Dimensions

    Printer

    350 x 350 x 400 mm
    (13.7 x 13.7 x 15.7 in)

    Shipping Box

    460 x 470 x 570 mm
    (18.1 x 18.5 x 22.4 in)
    25 kg (55 lbs)

    Printing
    technology LPD
    build volume 140 x 140 x 140 mm
    5.5 x 5.5 x 5.5 in
    resolution 90-200 microns
    material container cartridge
    wall thickness optimal: 800 microns
    resolution of single printable point 400 microns
    material diameter 1.75 mm (0.069 in)
    nozzle diameter 0.4 mm (0.015 in)
    minimum single positioning 1.5 microns
    positioning precision (X/Y) 1.5 microns
    z-axis single step 1.25 microns
    Temperature
    extruder maximum temperature 380°C (716°F)
    heated platform yes
    platform maximum temperature 90°C (194°F)
    ambient operation temperature 15°-35°C (60°-95°F)
    storage temperature 0°-35°C (32°-95°F)

     

    Electrical
    AC input 110/240 V ~ 2 A 50/60 Hz
    power requirements 24 V DC @ 11 A
    power consumption 160 W
    3D Printer
    support Dissolvable – printed from a different material as the model
    HEPA filter Yes
    material consumption sensor Yes
    chip with information about material Yes
    extruder printing with the main and the support material
    connectivity SD card (included)
    available materials Z-PETG
    Z-PLA
    Z-SUPPORT

     

    Software
    software bundle Z-SUITE
    file types stl., obj., dxf., 3mf.
    supports Mac OS X / Windows 7 and newer versions

    Want To Know More?

    Our team of 3D printing professionals are just an email or a phone call away.

    contact us

    Phone

    03 9687 8638

    Yarraville, VIC 3013
